question: Johann Johannsson, the renowned musician has passed away. He hailed from which country?
explanation: Johann Johannsson (48), the acclaimed Icelandic musician, has passed away in Berlin, Germany on February 8, 2018. He was known for giving background scores to films such as \"Arrival\", \"Sicario\" and \"The Theory of Everything\". He won a Golden Globe in 2015 for his score to the Stephen Hawking biopic. His work is stylised by its blending of traditional orchestration with contemporary electronic elements
